dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 117 IH: Energy Efficiency Free Market Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burgess introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To repeal Federal energy conservation standards, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Energy Efficiency Free Market Act of 2017.

subsection.text: Section 321 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6291) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4), by striking , determined in accordance with test procedures under section 323;
in paragraph (5), by striking , determined in accordance with test procedures under section 323;
in paragraph (7), by striking , determined in accordance with section 323;
in paragraph (29), by striking subparagraphs (C), (D), (E), (G), (H), (I), (J), (K), (L), (M), (N), (O), and (P);
in paragraph (30), by striking subparagraphs (G), (O), (U), and (V);
in paragraph (31), by striking subparagraph (H); and

subsection.text: Section 323 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6293) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking a test procedure is applicable under subsection (a) and inserting a test procedure was applicable under subsection (a) or (b), as in effect on the day before the date of enactment of the Energy Efficiency Free Market Act of 2017,; and

subsection.text: Section 324 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6294) is amended—

clause.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking and to which standards are applicable under section 325;
in subparagraph (C)(i), by striking and to which standards are applicable under section 325;

item.text: in item (aa), by striking ; and and inserting a period; and

clause.text: by striking the comma at the end of subparagraph (A) and inserting ; and; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(A), by striking (determined in accordance with test procedures prescribed under section 323) each place it appears;
in paragraph (8)(A), by striking in accordance with test procedures prescribed under section 323 and inserting in accordance with generally accepted industry testing procedures.

subsection.text: Section 325 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6295) is repealed.
Section 326 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6296) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (4), by striking in accordance with the test procedures applicable to such product under section 323 and inserting in accordance with generally accepted industry testing procedures; and
in paragraph (5), by striking 323, 324, or 325 and inserting 324; and
by striking and the economic impact of any proposed energy conservation standard; and
by striking test procedures, labeling rules, and energy conservation standards and inserting labeling rules.

subsection.text: Section 327 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6297) is amended by striking subsections (a) through (f) and inserting the following:
No State or Federal agency may adopt or continue in effect any requirement to comply with a standard for energy conservation or water efficiency with respect to a product.
Section 332(a) of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6302(a)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4), by striking the semicolon and inserting ; or;
in paragraph (8)(D), by striking described in section 325(e)(6)(A)(ii)(V).

subsection.text: Section 333 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6303) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking or violations of paragraph (5), (6), (7), or (8) and inserting a violation of paragraph (8); and
by striking Each violation of paragraph (1), (2), (5), (6), (7), or (8) and inserting Each violation of paragraph (1), (2), or (8); and

subsection.text: Section 334 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6304) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the first sentence, by striking or 325;
in the second sentence, by striking (5), (6), (7), or ; and

subsection.text: Section 335(a) of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6305(a)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking the semicolon at the end and inserting ; or;
in paragraph (2), by striking ; or and inserting a period;
in the matter following paragraph (3), by striking the second and third sentences.

subsection.text: Section 336 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6306) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking 323, 324, 325, 327, or 328 and inserting 324 or 328; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by striking section 323, 324, or 325 each place it appears and inserting 324; and

subsection.text: Section 337 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6307) is amended by striking subsection (b).
Part C of title III of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6311 et seq.) is repealed.
